name: BLAZE (VOXY)
description:
IN DEVELOPMENT In this Sandbox Top-Down Shooter, you can spawn enemies and obliterate them in slow motion. HOW TO PLAY Left Click - Shoot
WASD/ARROWS - Move
Right Click - Spawn Enemies
R - Respawn/Reset Position - 
(Spam if Enemeies are Camping Spawn)
V - Toggle Slow Motion
O - Toggle Music
X - Change Player Colour
Z - Toggle Arrow Guide
